name: Immigration Services
description: LSC represents children in immigration cases to ensure that they can remain in a safe place with access to opportunity. If you are under age 21 and live in Northern California, LSC can do a free legal screening with you and advise you about your legal options. If you qualify for SIJS, DACA, T Visa, or U Visa (lawful immigration relief options) and live in San Francisco County, they may be able to represent you in your case for free. They offer services in English and Spanish and can access trans
